page.title: 08GULF REFINERY AND THE HAVEN
page.content: There is{1 pipeline}which runs under the Haven from{Gulf to Texaco which contains crude oil which is then put into the{Catalytic Cracking unit and comes out as four different things {1.}Light catalytic cracked naptha known as L.C.C.N.{2.}Heavy catalytic cracked naptha known as H.C.C.N. {3.}Alkylate.{4.}Cycle oils. These are {returned}in separate{pipelines to Gulf There is also{1 pipeline to Pembroke {Power Station}taking heavy fuel oil. All the{water}used in the refinery cannot just be dumped in the Haven because it might contain oil.So first it goes through 2 A.P.I.separators which take out oil and solid. Then to the final catch basin where it is oxygenated before being returned to the harbour. by Anna-Jane Clarke {
